Text: Thanks for the upload.  Overall this was a weird show which had started with some good new plots and material but ended up being a liberal "X Files"  The quality of the story line nosedived after coming to America.

Agreed. Torchwood Season 1 and 2 where the best ones. 

Miracle Day is good and all. But it sucks that they have no "lair" as in the first ones, and moreover they've got no acess to alien tech as they had in the first two series.

Also, miracle day was too short.

IMDB lists a season called Torchwood: Web of Lies, supposedly broadcast during the summer of 2011, with Jack, Gwen and starring Elisha Dushku...... looking for this everywhere..... if anyone has an idea where I can find this torrent, leave me a message'

@ravenstone Web of Lies was a webcast, and was tied into an iOS app. However, the episodes are freely available on YouTube. Each episode is only a couple of minutes--it's tied into the Miracle Day story, btw.
